summary: Two rival runners compete in a military exercise and later, at an overnight inn where they stop to rest, meet a young woman whose little girl is ill.
cast: Shûji Sano|Shin'ichi Himori|Toshiaki Konoe|Chishû Ryû|Kenji Ôyama|Yoshiko Tsubouchi|Jun Yokoyama|Fujiyo Osafune|Shotaro Akagi|America-Kozô|Tomio Aoki|Kaneko Fujiwara|Kaoru Futaba|Masao Hayama|Mitsuko Higashiyama|Takatsugu Ishiyama|Kazuko Komaki|Fusako Maki|Mitsuko Mito|Masami Morikawa|Einosuke Naka|Kazuji Sakai|Hiroo Wakabayashi|Munenobu Yui
title: Hanagata senshu
